data.name: Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution
data.description: Vulnerability in Apache Log4j allows attackers to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

data.name: Windows Print Spooler Privilege Escalation
data.description: A vulnerability in Windows Print Spooler service allows local users to gain elevated privileges.

data.name: OpenSSL Buffer Overflow
data.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in OpenSSL allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service.

data.name: Kubernetes API Server Authentication Bypass
data.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Kubernetes API Server allows unauthorized access.

data.name: SQL Injection in WordPress Plugin
data.description: SQL injection vulnerability in popular WordPress plugin allows attackers to access sensitive data.
